articles.content:

articles.author: Dominic King
articles.title: Virgil van Dijk says Mo Salah will take his form to new heights after Community Shield victory - Daily Mail
articles.description: DOMINIC KING: Liverpool's Dutch star believes that his Reds team-mate will take his form to new heights this season after seeing him star in their Community Shield win on Saturday
articles.content:
Virgil van Dijk expects Mohamed Salah to take his form to higher levels after clearing his mind of the contract issues that became a distraction.
